actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Rail Passenger Service Act in order to provide reduced rates for certain services for the handicapped.

summary.text: Provides, under the Rail Passenger Service Act, that handicapped persons requiring any special service because of such person's disability shall be charged at a rate not exceeding 50 percent of the differential cost between the regular service and such special service.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Rail Passenger Service Act in order to provide reduced rates for certain services for the handicapped.
